title: [Large-scale] Mobile Learning-Based Leadership Competency Enhancement Program: Learner Needs Analysis Through Surveys

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Social leadership education curriculum design for corporate managers/leaders using mobile learning platforms. Applies survey methods to diagnose learners' mobile learning readiness and attitudes

learning_goals: Learners can analyze requirements for establishing a mobile learning environment.
Learners can assess organizational members' digital learning readiness using survey tools.
Learners can design a mobile-based leadership education roadmap based on the analysis results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
